poem:
### Severance

Along the border,  
a tangle of broken ties  
leaves a barren earth—  
papers flutter, lost,  
their ink fading,  
between the hands of brothers.  
Dust settles quietly  
where voices once  
echoed hope—  
a hollow wind  
swallows expectation,  
as futures fold  
beneath scorched skies.
